text: int main ( int argc , char * argv [ ] ) { int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , tmp , i , j , x , k , n , sum , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < k ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } sum = - 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < k ; i ++ ) { max = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { tmp = arr [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( tmp > max ) max = tmp ; } sum = sum + max ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
